Name: RAYBEEM - Live in Your Music
About the game: Live in your music with Raybeem, a new VR music visualizer for Oculus Rift and HTC Vive. Load in your favorite tunes and watch them shape the world around you in Virtual Reality. Find your vibe by selecting a theme that fits the pace of your mood and music. If only every reality was as sublime as Raybeem. Experience Different Themes in Raybeem Features Experience your music in environments that react to the music. Listen to music in VR. Load in music from your PC or web streams. Switch between different themes on the fly to find your perfect vibe. Works as VR or Desktop app. Save a screenshot of your view at any time.
